articles.title: Governor to make announcement on interstate quarantine rules Friday - KTUU.com
articles.description: Gov. Mike Dunleavy said he will make an announcement surrounding the 14-day self-quarantine for people coming into Alaska from out of state on Friday. The quarantine is a part of Health Mandate 010 and is set to expire on June 2 unless extended.
